title: Best budget PC
body: I used to game heavily for a few years when I was younger and played a variety of games like minecraft, everquest 2, and of course league. My last computer broke a couple years ago and my dad never got around to buying me another one but now my birthday is coming up and Im trying to get back into gaming. The only problem is, Im on a tight budget. The budget would probably be around $400, but less is always better. I know building one would be the best idea for this price but Im not sure that my parents are willing to do that. Accessories arent needed as I still have my Razer Naga and Blackwidow from my old computer

replies.body: I just realized Help & Support post wasnt exactly what I thought it was lol.

No worries! We always try our best to be as helpful as possible! ^_^

While I can't really endorse anything myself, but a good resource for making sure League will run on what you build would be our [**minimum specs page**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654)!

I know it's not a lot, but hopefully, that can help guide you a little in what the bottom line choices should be!
